ddl:
CREATE TABLE `patents-public-data.google_patents_research.annotations_202101`
(
  publication_number STRING,
  ocid INT64,
  preferred_name STRING,
  domain STRING,
  source STRING,
  confidence FLOAT64,
  character_offset_start INT64,
  character_offset_end INT64,
  inchi STRING,
  inchi_key STRING,
  smiles STRING,
  conf_bucket INT64
)
PARTITION BY RANGE_BUCKET(conf_bucket, GENERATE_ARRAY(0, 1000, 10))
CLUSTER BY publication_number, domain;

CREATE TABLE `patents-public-data.google_patents_research.publications_202004`
(
  publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Patent publication number (DOCDB compatible), eg: 'US-7650331-B1'."),
  title STRING OPTIONS(description="The (possibly machine translated) English title."),
  title_translated BOOL OPTIONS(description="True if the title is machine-translated by Google Translate."),
  abstract STRING OPTIONS(description="The (possibly machine translated) English abstract."),
  abstract_translated BOOL OPTIONS(description="True if the abstract is machine-translated by Google Translate."),
  cpc ARRAY<STRUCT<code STRING OPTIONS(description="Classification code"), inventive BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification inventive/main?"), first BOOL OPTIONS(description="Is this classification the first/primary?"), tree ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The full classification tree from the root to this code")>> OPTIONS(description="The Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) codes with the hierarchy."),
  cpc_low ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) codes and their parents, in an array for easier querying."),
  cpc_inventive_low ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The inventive Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) codes and their parents, in an array for easier querying."),
  top_terms ARRAY<STRING> OPTIONS(description="The top 10 salient terms extracted from this patent's title, abstract, claims and description."),
  similar ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="Semantically similar documents based on content and metadata."),
  url STRING OPTIONS(description="URL to the patents.google.com page for this patent."),
  country STRING OPTIONS(description="Country name."),
  publication_description STRING OPTIONS(description="Description of the publication type."),
  cited_by ARRAY<STRUCT<publication_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [publication_number]"), application_number STRING OPTIONS(description="Same as [application_number]"), npl_text STRING OPTIONS(description="Free-text citation (non-patent literature, etc)."), type STRING OPTIONS(description="The type of reference (see parent field for values)."), category STRING OPTIONS(description="The category of reference (see parent field for values)."), filing_date INT64 OPTIONS(description="The filing date.")>> OPTIONS(description="Publications that cite this publication."),
  embedding_v1 ARRAY<FLOAT64> OPTIONS(description="(Version 1) Machine-learned vector embedding based on document contents and metadata, where two documents that have similar technical content have a high dot product score of their embedding vectors.")
);
